question_text:
Question 48 
Electrical machine ( 3 phase induction motor)
 
 
A 3-phase, 415 V, 50 Hz, 6 pole, 960 RPM, 4 HP squirrel cage induction motor drives a constant torque 
load at rated speed operating from rated supply and delivering rated output. If the supply voltage and 
frequency are reduced by 20%, the resultant speed of the motor in RPM (neglecting the stator leakage 
impedance and rotational losses) is _____. (round off to the nearest integer). 
Ans. 760 (760 to 760) 
Sol.
